Class SocketClientHandler

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.galaxytrucker.Network.Client.SocketClientHandler
public class SocketClientHandler extends Object
This class handles the communication between the server and a client. It reads messages from the client, processes them, and sends responses back.

  • Constructor Details

    • SocketClientHandler

      public SocketClientHandler(Socket socket, ServerController serverController, SocketServer server, ObjectInputStream input, ObjectOutputStream output)
      Constructor for SocketClientHandler. Initializes the socket, server, input and output streams.
      Parameters:
      socket - the socket connected to the client
      serverController - the controller managing the server logic
      server - the server instance
      input - the input stream for reading messages from the client
      output - the output stream for sending messages to the client

  • Method Details

    • runVirtualView

      public void runVirtualView() throws IOException, ClassNotFoundException
      This method runs the virtual view, continuously listening for messages from the client. It processes each message and calls the appropriate methods in the server controller.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs while reading from or writing to the socket
      ClassNotFoundException - if the class of a serialized object cannot be found

    • showMessage

      public void showMessage(it.polimi.ingsw.galaxytrucker.Network.Message obj)
      This method displays the message received from the client. It checks if the message is a string message and prints it to the console.
      Parameters:
      obj - the message object received from the client

    • sendMessageToClient

      public void sendMessageToClient(String message) throws IOException
      This method sends a message to the client. It creates a Message object and writes it to the output stream.
      Parameters:
      message - the message to be sent to the client
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs while writing to the output stream

    • closeConnection

      public void closeConnection()
      This method closes the connection to the client. It closes the input and output streams, and the socket. It also updates the server to remove this client from its list.

    • getNickname

      public String getNickname()
      This method sets the game associated with this client handler.
      Parameters:
      game - the game to be associated with this client handler

    • getObjOut

      public ObjectOutputStream getObjOut()
      This method sets the game associated with this client handler.
      Parameters:
      game - the game to be associated with this client handler

    • callSpecificMethod

      public void callSpecificMethod(it.polimi.ingsw.galaxytrucker.Network.Message msg) throws ClassNotFoundException
      This method sets the game associated with this client handler.
      Parameters:
      game - the game to be associated with this client handler
      Throws:
      ClassNotFoundException
